medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started 18 months previously, gradually becoming more frequent and severe despite treatment with oral and sublingual nitrates and atenolol. Central chest pain and dyspnea occurred at rest and with emotional stress, responding poorly to sublingual nitrates. Symptoms continued to deteriorate, leading to an inability to work.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Family history of coronary artery disease; previous history of smoking; menopause.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of coronary artery disease.
